## BIO

I am a computational neuroscience enthusiast with signal processing expertise. A passionate explorer of computational neuroscience methods, my diverse interests span from analyzing neural signals (spikes/fMRI/EEG/DTI) to developing cutting-edge dynamic models for neuroscientific applications. If you would like to collaborate with my explorations, please contact me.

## Research Interests

1.  Computational Neuroscience

2.  Signal Processing
